CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper May 8, 1954, pg. 18, reads: "Mambo Session - The pulsating beat of tropical drums and the scintillating gyration of passionate dancers will highlight the Victor Hereford Dance Revue at the IKS May 13 and 14. Shown above in a characteristic pose, left to right,  are Eddie Jackson, Victor Hereford, Yvonne Hones and Donald Lewis. - Harris Photo. (Advt.)
TitMainTitle: Dancers from Victor Hereford Dance Revue in Caribbean-style costumes including Eddie Jackson with drum, Victor Hereford, Yvonne Jones (Kemp), and Donald Lewis with conga drum, posed in gymnasium
